website_summaries.verdict: The Fujitsu ScanSnap iX100 portable scanner lets you leave your computer at home and scan to a smartphone or tablet instead, making it easy to check scan quality on the spot.
pros: Scans with or without a computer
Scans to smartphones and tablets so you can see scanned images immediately
cons: If you scan business cards to your mobile device, there's no way to import them to the business card program later

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: A very small scanner, almost 'cute'. Software easy to load and update. Runs off USB. So far pulls paper through easily and love the little paper guide on the back which pushed the paper up (as opposed to just out the rear) saving even more desk space. Software easy to use. Only scanned to pdf at time of writing but scans cleanly and I have no doubt scanning to OCR or other applications will be just as clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: I hate this scanner. I bought it to replace my beloved old scansnap s1100 because that one wouldn’t work with my new computer The old scanner made it easy to scan directly to Evernote, but this one makes EVERYTHING incredibly difficult. You have to go through several very slow steps before you can get your document into Evernote. Why did Fujitsu take a concept that was brilliant and ruin it?
customer_reviews.author: smalltownheaven

customer_reviews.title: I'm delighted with this little scanner
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted with this little scanner, tiny, great image quality, and no messy mains leads. The feed is good and it doesn't damage the originals. Scanning technology has really improved these last few years, but it's the compact size that really counts - the ScanSnap takes up hardly any space.
customer_reviews.author: Nigel R.

customer_reviews.title: This scanner is connected to my Macbook, its small ...
customer_reviews.text: This scanner is connected to my Macbook, its small and compact. This just slips in my case with my macbook. This is absolutely lovely scanner to carry around and use whereever you take it
customer_reviews.author: lisamaxiloulou

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Does the job perfectly. I love that I can carry it in my hand-bag as I need to take it with me to work. Easy setup
customer_reviews.author: Rasa J.

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy scanner
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, quick and easy to use, takes great scans for documents. Really pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: pinkyminx

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. A compact little scanner for desk top use and for travelling with. Not used it much yet but so far I am very impressed - the speed of scanning is so much better than our flatbed scanner :)
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a super little scanner - is minimalist in nature and I love it!! Well worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: ciara

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Small and exactly what I wanted. Can't find any faults - scan away!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The scan quality is good and the speed is fine
customer_reviews.text: Very small and light. The scan quality is good and the speed is fine. The software (on OS X) looks a little on the dated side but does work well enough.
customer_reviews.author: uk person

customer_reviews.title: This is a remarkably easy to use and small scanner
customer_reviews.text: This is a remarkably easy to use and small scanner. Perfect for a home office where space is at a premium. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: mdx

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Document Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what I expected allowing contents of physical filing cabinet to be drastically reduced. Software very convenient to use. Hardware unobtrusive and works well. Only had it for a few weeks so cannot comment sensibly on reliability. Obviously cannot replace a flatbed scanner but so much more convenient to use for the vast majority of the time. Thoroughly recommended if your aim is to get rid of paperwork that you will probably never need to use again but just might!
customer_reviews.author: DP Mountain

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: The Fujitsu ScanSnap S1100i Scanner was very easy to setup. The scanning quality and speed is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: DevArt

customer_reviews.title: Best Small Scanner
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few scanners in the past and none have met my expectations until now. This scanner is small but produces great scans to my MacBook Air quickly and simply, at the moment I am using to add all my favourite pre digital photos to my camera roll. I will then use it to file lots of letter receipts and other items to decrease the amount of paperwork I have stored. I did not buy mine from Amazon, but have purchased the case to keep my scanner safe and dust free.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Was good but now obsolete
customer_reviews.text: Fujitsu site states they will not be updating their software for this (and other products) for 64bit operating systems such as OSX 15 Catalina. They recommend buying a new Scanner ! If you google "S1100 catalina" you will find the details.
customer_reviews.author: Antony

customer_reviews.title: Built to last.
customer_reviews.text: I have the ScanSnap S1100 which looks physically identical to this one. I just looked back at some old documents I scanned dated June 2011. I scan a dozen or so sheets per week and have been for the last 5 years. It has survived drops and jams. Still working as good as new and perfect for producing copy-and-paste-able PDF files that get sent straight to Evernote.
customer_reviews.author: R. Fisher

feature_bullets: Create a searchable PDF file with the touch of a button and scan sizes from business card to A4
Portable device that can be powered via USB with cross-platform compatibility for PC and Mac
Scan and create an editable Word, Excel or PowerPoint file
Bundled with software for scanning business cards or receipts and extracting data
Scan to your smart devices and cloud accounts
